sentences: Ta oli mingil moel eriline isiksus.
context: The Estonian word 'mingil' is an adverbial form of the pronoun 'mingi' (some/a certain). It typically appears in the adessive case (-l ending) and indicates occurrence at an unspecified point in time, on a particular day, or in a manner that isn't specified. It's used when you want to indicate something happened but don't specify exactly when, where, or how.
